title: 16. Launching API Security scan using CyberSecuriti.ai's APISecTM CLI
description: CyberSecuriti.ai provides the industry-leading cloud-native API security solution that instantly detects top vulnerabilities stemming from business-logic, access-control, role-configurations, & injection flaws targeting the API layer. In this scenario, you will see how APISecTM CLI launches an API security 'Broken Authentication' scan on a sample API.
